H0.text: Confederatio Helvetica was the former name of which modern-day country. Austria

H1.text: Confederatio Helvetica was the former name of which modern-day country. Germany

H2.text: Confederatio Helvetica was the former name of which modern-day country. Italy

H3.text: Confederatio Helvetica was the former name of which modern-day country. Suiza

A4.text: The Latin name Confoederatio Helvetica was introduced after the formation of the federal state in 1848, harking back to the Napoleonic Helvetic Republic.

A5.text: The ISO banking code 'CHF' for the Swiss franc, Swiss postage stamps ('HELVETIA'), and the country's top-level domain '.ch' are all derived from the Latin name Confoederatio Helvetica.
